dublin_core.dcvalue: The use of telemedicine especially as it is relates to telestroke has significantly expanded over the past one or two decades The fact that stroke therapy is a time critical disease process coupled with the relative paucity of stroke trained practitioners makes telestroke an attractive technique of care The authors objective was to summarize the evidence that support the reliability of telemedicine for diagnosis and efficacy in acute stroke treatment in collaboration between hospitals in two different countries
The cloud stroke unit: 24-hour acute stroke expertise-on-demand.
